mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NUM, WRITER, CREATE_DATE, TITLE, READ_CNT FROM SHOP_BOARD WHERE IS_ADMIN = 'Y' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT RNUM, BOARD_NUM, WRITER, CREATE_DATE, TITLE, READ_CNT FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, BOARD_NUM, WRITER, CREATE_DATE, TITLE, READ_CNT FROM( SELECT BOARD_NUM, WRITER, CREATE_DATE, TITLE, READ_CNT FROM SHOP_BOARD WHERE IS_ADMIN = 'N'
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND WRITER LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' OR WRITER LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC ) ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} and #{endRow}

SELECT COUNT(BOARD_NUM) FROM SHOP_BOARD WHERE IS_ADMIN = 'N'
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND WRITER LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' OR WRITER LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
SELECT BOARD_NUM, WRITER, CREATE_DATE, CONTENT, READ_CNT, TITLE, IS_ADMIN FROM SHOP_BOARD WHERE WRITER = #{loginId} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
